summary:
Slovakia is a landlocked country in Central Europe, bordering Poland, Ukraine, Hungary, Austria, and the Czech Republic. With an area of 49,000 sq. km and a population of over 5 million, its capital is Bratislava.

Historically, Slavs settled here in the 5th-6th centuries, forming various kingdoms and empires. It was part of Czechoslovakia after World War I but became an independent state in 1993.

Today, Slovakia is a developed country with a strong economy, offering universal healthcare and education. It is known for its car production and is a member of the European Union and NATO.
title: Slovakia
